textBeforeTable: Additional Details: (Passes to the Aspen Club & Spa can be obtained from any Frias Properties front desk during regular business hours.) All Frias Properties of Aspen guests receive complimentary passes to the Aspen Club & Spa, the valley’s premier full-service spa and workout facility. Complex amenities at the Alpenblick include free Aspen airport transfers, on-site free parking, ski lockers and free wireless internet access. Other amenities include marble countertops, an open living area with a wood-burning fireplace, a formal dining area and a kitchen with a breakfast bar, and a laundry closet with washer/dryer. This three level 3-bedroom, 4-bath deluxe townhome features a den on the lower level with a sleeper sofa and flatscreen TV - and is only two blocks to the Silver Queen Gondola and even closer to downtown Aspen.
